content:
AGvisorPRO improves economic productivity through technological upgrading and innovation, focusing on communication technology in the labour-intensive and high-value add agricultural sector (United Nations Sustainable Development Goals 8:Economic Growth & 9:Industry, Innovation, & Infrastructure). Our technology improves access to agriculture information for all farmers with a smartphone, regardless of operation size. Access to knowledge remotely will help industry recovery after COVID-19. 

AGvisorPRO provides knowledge resources/extension services that improve agricultural productivity and incomes of food producers. Access to knowledge ensures sustainable food production and resilient agricultural practices (UNSDG 2:Food Security). 

AGvisorPRO provides an inclusive work environment, offering remote work, benefits, and a tech & education allowance for employees (UNSDG 8:Decent Work). We value honesty, respect, and agility. We promote a positive, productive, and cooperative atmosphere.
